programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.

programme.title: Caesar leva Joseph até Veneza para conhecer sua mentora Lisa Lisa, que começa a treiná-lo com rigor para aprender a controlar seus poderes.

programme.title: Lisa Lisa diz a Joseph que ele precisa da pedra chamada Super Aja para destruir os Homens do Pilar. Joseph e Caesar enfrentam outros mestres.

programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Pedra Vermelha deixa Kars praticamente invencível. Joseph planeja atrair Kars para um vulcão e acabar com ele por lá.

programme.title: Kars surge da lava derretida e ataca Joseph, que instintivamente segura a Pedra Vermelha para se proteger dos golpes do inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possuído por um espírito maligno

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 1

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.title: Algo estranho está crescendo no braço de Joseph. Quando um médico tenta retirá-lo, um rosto aparece no tumor e declara ser um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Victor e o Segredo da Mansão do Crocodilo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Quando Victor, um menino de 11 anos, muda para a velha mansão do tio avô, descobre que lá desapareceu uma jovem chamada Cecilia. Victor não terá dúvidas em seguir as pistas para encontrar a verdade, mesmo que tenha que enfrentar grandes aventuras.

programme.title: A História de Wim, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dois ex-presidiários tentam incriminar o detetive mocinho que os mandou para a prisão. No entanto, um grupo de crianças encerrou as operações dos gângsteres com a ajuda de alguns amigos do reino animal.

programme.title: Os Sete Corvos, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em dois contos de fadas dos irmãos Grimm - Os Sete Corvos e Os Seis Cisnes.

programme.title: Congo, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma expedição desaparece no Congo, um grupo é enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Em Busca do Castelo Dourado, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha são envenenados, os irmãos Per e Pal são presos suspeitos do crime. O caçula da família, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendário castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da Água da Vida

programme.title: Pequenos Espiões 4, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson é casada com Wilbur, um repórter conhecido por desmascarar espiões, e com ele tem um bebê e duas crianças. O que o marido não sabe é que a esposa é uma ex-espiã, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar à família.

programme.title: Ultra Galaxy Fight - Heróis da Nova Geração, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Em um planeta muito além da galáxia, Ultraman X e Ultraman geed são atacados por dois misteriosos guerreiros das trevas. Enquanto isso, a Ultrawoman Grigio foi abduzida por Ultra Dark-Killer.

programme.title: Em Busca do Portal Mágico, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: A quieta e divertida Monika se muda para uma nova casa e faz amizade com David. Juntos, eles encontram um relógio mágico capaz de fazê-los viajar no tempo. Mas seria essa a solução para os problemas de todos?

programme.title: Um Conto Sobre o Tempo, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Neste conto de fadas, Urban é um aprendiz de relojoeiro que segue os passos de seu corajoso mestre, Apbán, e parte em uma ousada jornada para encontrar um relógio com o poder de avisar a quem o possui sobre sua própria morte.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dmitri e James, dois poderosos assassinos de elite contratados pelo governo, se reconectam após seu último trabalho no Sudeste Asiático.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: My Friend Irma Goes West, (1950, Comedy)
programme.desc: Singer Steve, friend Seymour and fiance Jane, along with her dizzy blonde room mate Irma, have a series of misadventures on a California-bound train and end up involved with a gang of murderous gangsters in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Flower Drum Song, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: A young woman arrives in San Francisco's Chinatown from Hong Kong with the intention of marrying a rakish nightclub owner, unaware he is involved with one of his singers.

programme.title: South Pacific, (1958, Musical)
programme.desc: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: The African Queen, (1951, Action)
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: Bogie and Holden are the mega-rich Larrabee brothers of Long Island. Bogie’s all work, Holden’s all playboy. But when Sabrina (Hepburn), daughter of the family’s chauffeur, returns from Paris, the stage is set for some family fireworks.

programme.title: Death Warrant, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: The most towering myth of all time meets up with the mission of a real man in this action-adventure thriller that reveals the famed symbol of courage as he’s never been seen before: finding the hero’s heart that beats beneath his colossal image.

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Sound and Sand Ninja, along with Orochimaru, begin their move to destroy Hidden Leaf Village. The arena has become a battleground.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Along with Pakkun, Naruto, Sakura and Shikamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke. Pakkun senses nine of Orochimaru’s men coming after them.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru traps the Hokage inside a barrier and they continue to battle.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke finally catches up to Gaara, Temari, and Kankuro. Kankuro escapes with Gaara leaving Temari to face Sasuke.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The battle between the Hokage and Orochimaru rages on. Finally, the Hokage resorts to a Jutsu unknown to Orochimaru, the Sealing Jutsu known as “Reaper Death Seal.”
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shino appears as Sasuke and Kankuro battle. Leaving Shino to handle Kankuro, Sasuke goes after Gaara.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Half of Gaara’s body has transformed and Sasuke continues his battle against him.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: By the time Naruto and Sakura catch up, Sasuke has exhausted his strength and collapsed.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is helpless against Gara’s immense power. While Naruto declares that he fights for his comrades, Gaara says he fights for himself.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is helpless against Gaara’s overpowering strength. However, after seeing Sasuke risking life and limb to save him and Sakura…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gaara employs his Playing Possum Jutsu, which allows the Sand Spirit within him, Shukaku, to display its true power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With every ounce of their power, Gaara and Naruto continue to fight. Determined to protect Sakura, Naruto attacks Gaara again and again.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru's plan to destroy the Village Hidden in the Leaves is stopped.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kakashi arrives in the nick of time to help Asuma and Kurenai, and Itachi, too, enters the fray.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya and Naruto are on a journey to find Tsunade, one of the legendary Sannin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Intent on confronting Itachi, Sasuke rushes to the town where Naruto is staying.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Let The Right One In, (2008, Foreign Horror)
programme.desc: Lonely, 12-year-old Oskar is bullied by his classmates. A new friendship develops when Eli, a pale young girl who only comes out at night, moves in next door. Coinciding with her arrival is a series of inexplicable disappearances and murders.

programme.title: Let Me In (2010), (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chloë Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Death Wish, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When his wife (Elisabeth Shue) and daughter (Camila Morrone) are savagely assaulted, an enraged doctor (Bruce Willis) seeks his own justice, becoming part deadly avenger and part guardian angel in director Eli Roth's reinvention of the classic!

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Crime)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer, (1993, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Comedy sensation Mike Myers stars with Nancy Travis in this hatchet-driven romantic comedy about a wedlock-shy coffee house poet who finally meets the perfect woman. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Tommy Boy, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tommy's earned his diploma and a job at Callahan Auto Parts. However, the family business starts tanking and now Tommy hits the road with his dad's right-hand man, a smug numberscruncher.

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sarah has always been different. So as the new girl at St. Benedict's Academy, she immediately falls in with the high school outsiders. But these girls won't settle for being powerless misfits.

programme.title: Boxcar Bertha, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the Depression era of the 1930s, a young woman and three men rob trains and plan a kidnapping. The men are caught and the woman becomes a prostitute. Based on "Sister of the Road" by Boxcar Bertha Thomson as told to Ben L. Reitman.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Goin' South, (1978, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: JACK NICHOLSON plays Henry Moon, a third-rate outlaw, in this romantic comedy set in the 1860s.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With only a handful of life points remaining and the Nordic God, Thor, staring down at him, Jack gets set to take on his next opponent - Team Ragnarok's Broder!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After swooping in take on Team Ragnarok's Broder, Crow finds himself battling two Nordic Gods  Thor and Loki! Can Crow defeat these two dynamos, or will this dynamic duo prove to be too much for Crow and his battle-tested Blackwings?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the tournament on the line, Yusei must find a way to defeat Halldor before the three Nordic Gods knock his life points down to nothing!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: It's the exciting conclusion to the semifinal battle between Team Ragnarok and Team 5D's! Can Yusei Fudo muster a miracle comeback against Team Ragnarok's Halldor?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The grand finale of the World Racing Grand Prix is set to start, and our two finalists -Team 5D's and Team New World - are ready to take center stage. For Yusei, Jack and Crow, second place isn't an option!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: It's one down and two to go for Team 5D's as Jack and his mighty Red Nova Dragon get set to take on and take out Primo and Jakob of Team New World!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Jack out of commission, all eyes turn to Crow as he swoops in to duel Jakob! Does Crow have what it takes to take down Team New World's best duelist, or will Crow suffer the same cruel fate that sent his teammate crashing into defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance, Yusei Fudo from Team 5D's looks to rev it up against Team New World's Jakob in the final round of the World Racing Grand Prix!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After witnessing Jakob, Primo and Lester fuse together to form the all-powerful Aporia, Yusei must now figure out a way to defeat this formidable foe before he destroys New Domino City!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In the exciting conclusion to the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei Fudo, facing his toughest opponent ever, must rev it up one last time if he hopes to defeat Aporia and save New Domino City from being destroyed!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Swing into Action: Part 1
programme.desc: Swing into action with the dueltainer Yuya Sakaki as he takes center stage in an all-new Action Duel where running, jumping, diving and dueling can make you a champion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Swing into Action: Part 2
programme.desc: With The Sledgehammer set to strike, Yuya uses Pendulum power to swing the duel his way! Can this phenomenal new summoning method help Yuya hammer the Hammer?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trade Bait: Part 1
programme.desc: It could be curtains for Yuya when a rival student cons him out of his Pendulum Cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trade Bait: Part 2
programme.desc: Still shocked by Sylvio’s Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Toying Around: Part 1
programme.desc: The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher! Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler won’t give up until Yuya gives in!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Toying Around: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya’s getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora! Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuya’s Pendulum power not going to make the grade?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Mr. Mystery
programme.desc: Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback! But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how it’s done!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Bad Business
programme.desc: The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuya’s duel school, and they’re bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dueling with the Stars
programme.desc: The battle to save Yuya’s duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institute’s Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: You Show 'Em
programme.desc: It’s a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institute’s diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Going, Going, Gong
programme.desc: It’s all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Under the Big Top
programme.desc: It’s a battle under the big top, but no one’s clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuya’s duel school!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Circus Surprise!
programme.desc: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declan’s deck prove to be unbeatable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Yuya’s down in the dumps, but Principal Boyle’s not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: In It To Win It
programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance – Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Menu Venue: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya is served a heaping helping of culinary catastrophe when he duels a celebrity chef with a menu full of merciless food monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Menu Venue: Part 2
programme.desc: The table is set for a frenzied food fight to the finish! Can Yuya handle what Chef Pepper dishes out, or will he lose a lot more than his appetite?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Trapped in a Card
programme.desc: It’s a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Quiz Quagmire: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre L’Supérieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Quiz Quagmire: Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match that’s part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz who’s never wrong?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Date With Fate: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya’s future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

programme.title: The identity of the enigmatic Pound, the man half-buried in the woods, is revealed, but his deep connection to Big Mom might not be enough to save him! Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping Mom's minions at bay!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Top Officer! The Sweet 3 General Cracker Appears!

programme.title: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Enemy Worth 800 million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!

programme.title: Luffy continues to fight against Cracker, whose powers to manipulate his surroundings may prove more troublesome than he had thought! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate the Whole Cake Island - and must hatch a plan to avoid getting caught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability

programme.title: The wind starts to go out of Luffy's sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Benefactor's Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!

programme.title: Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa's power - and his father's dark history!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!

programme.title: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji's tragic childhood is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Past that He Let Go of! Vinsmoke Sanji!

programme.title: The terrible history of Sanji's family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion, he is able to escape, only to face his father's cruelty before setting out on his own.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the East Blue! Sanji's Resolute Departure!

programme.title: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker's endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy's endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiancée.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.title: Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits, he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji's reflection, but can they get a message to him in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form - Tank Man!

programme.title: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1

programme.title: Sanji's journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2

programme.title: Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama's army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!

programme.title: Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Adventure! Sanji's Resolute Proposal!

programme.title: Luffy puts his all into battling Big Mom's vengeful army, however, their skills combined prove too formidable. Meanwhile, Sanji goes to Big Mom herself to bargain for the Straw Hats lives - with shocking results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Wait Here! Luffy vs. the Enraged Army!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot are captured by Brulee and strung up for dinner! But Chopper sees a chance to free himself! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro launch a plan to reach the Ponegliffs - a daring game of chance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invading the Chateau! Reach the Road Ponegliff!

programme.title: Pekoms creates a diversion for Brook to set his plan into action. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to goad Big Mom into a fight, and Pudding begins to have stirrings of rebellion herself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Confrontation! Luffy and Big Mom!

programme.title: Just when Luffy and Nami are in Big Mom's grasp, Pudding arrives, but with news that they aren't expecting - meanwhile Brook and Chopper both make headway getting out of their own jams!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shout of the Soul! Brook and Pedro's Lightning Operation!

programme.title: Sanji hopes his wedding with Pudding will solve the Straw Hat's predicament - but Pudding secretly plans to to avoid the marriage, sharing a secret with Luffy. Meanwhile, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy tries desperately to free himself as the risk of his own well-being! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot continue to search the mirror universe, Brook squares off against Big Mom, and Pedro's past is revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The History of the Left Eye! Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!

programme.title: Luffy struggles to break himself free as Sanji falls deeper in love with the idea of marrying Pudding... But the mask falls off and the deadly charade of Big Mom is revealed as the depths of her treachery come to light!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moist Cigarette! The Night Before Sanji's Wedding!

programme.title: Brook continues his all-out struggle against Big Mom, but his secret weapon might not be enough to save him! Meanwhile, an unexpected ally from the past comes to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Undaunted Soul! Brook vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: Jimbei arrives on the scene and works to free Luffy and Nami! Meanwhile Sanji confronts his sister with the awful truth of Pudding, and she confides in him the powerful secret of their mother's undying love!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Brook finds himself totally at the whim of Big Mom, and comes face to face with her brutal love! Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his explosive plan to create a distraction!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Reach Sanji! Luffy's Vengeful Hell-bent Dash!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot use the mirror dimension to get in touch with Nami and Jimbei! Luffy makes it through more obstacles to learn that he just missed Sanji! Meanwhile, Sanji wonders alone about the best course of action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Chateau in Turmoil! Luffy, to the Rendezvous!

programme.title: Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile, Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Montd'Or.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Deciding to Say Goodbye! Sanji and his Straw-Hat Bento!

programme.title: Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he's in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!

programme.title: Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!

programme.title: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji's explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision, to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!

programme.title: The Straw Hats put Jimbei's plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!

programme.title: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege's team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege's Allied Forces!

programme.title: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.
